CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Corn?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Corn is arc {Oats}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Oats?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Oats is arc {Corn}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Barley to Wheat in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Wheat to Corn in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Corn and Oats in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Corn and Oats is {163}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Wheat and Soybeans in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Wheat and Soybeans is {27}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Wheat?
SC.A: The total flow output from Wheat is {438}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Corn?
SC.A: The total flow input by Corn is {412}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 198? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {200} from {Corn} to {Barley}, a flow of {203} from {Oats} to {Wheat}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 37? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {27} from {Wheat} to {Soybeans}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 102 and 122? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {117} from {Corn} to {Oats}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Wheat to Barley or from Oats to Corn?
NC.A: The flow from {Oats} to {Corn} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Corn to Wheat, from Oats to Corn, or from Corn to Barley?
NC.A: The flow from {Corn} to {Barley} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Soybeans}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Oats} and {Wheat}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Barley, Arc Corn, Arc Wheat, Arc Oats, Arc Soybeans}.
